EmailTemplate.description: This email template is for advisors to send to student to request their approval to release academic/financial information as part of FERPA.
EmailTemplate.name: FERPA Release Authorization Form
EmailTemplate.subject: FERPA Release Authorization
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
As a student at St. Edward's University, and according to FERPA regulations, faculty staff may release your student and academic related information only if you've authorized that information to be released. Students can grant parents or other proxies access to this information, but this requires student authorization.
If you authorize a parent or other proxy to be able to obtain your student and academic information, please complete the FERPA Release Authorization Form.
Sincerely,
Student & Academic Services St. Edward's University
